website_summaries.verdict: A powerful trimmer and edger with an affordable price.
pros: Dual-position wheels aid the 3 modes and dual-position wheels
3 functions include grass trimming, edging, and mowing
Tool-free conversion from trimmer to edger
Quick-release lever to adjust telescopic height and 90-degree tilting shaft
Flower spacer guard protects plants when trimming and acts as edging guide
cons: String breaks often and requires taking unit apart to reset the string

website_summaries.verdict: 3 position settings convert this trimmer from a weed wacker to an edger, and a supported trimmer.
pros: 3-in-1 function has dual-position wheels for grass trimming, edging, and mowing
Lightweight, with tool-free adjustment from one function to the other
Battery charge is enough to work a quarter-acre yard, on average
cons: Trimmer is on the weak side for trimming

customer_reviews.title: Weak Battery
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to order this. However even though it does a great job when working...the battery DIES FAST! Leaves me in the middle of half a done yard which is very infuriating. I returned and asked for a new battery and thought maybe that it...but got the same result sadly. I'll have to return it....so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: I really like this weed eater
customer_reviews.text: I really like this weed eater. It is light, has plenty of power, and the battery last a real long time. I've used 5 times in about 2 months and I am still on the initial charge. The battery lasts a long time. The option of using the included wheels to trim along the curb, sidewalk, and driveway is really handy. I do recommend this product, well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Died after 8 months.... only want replacement.  Loved this - when it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July 2017. A week ago it stopped working, for no apparent reason. Batteries are good. This is my 2nd Worx trimmer/edger and I loved the 1st, but it was getting old and the new one had more features. So disappointed this died on me after only 8 months....I was hoping the manufacturer would stand behind their product, I wrote them but got no response. I see no way to return it for a replacement. Don't want a refund, only a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Double Bad Award - Bad Product - Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Battery runs for 5 minutes and the battery charger does not work! This is the second one! You buy this, you eat this...customer service is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: M MacLane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size of cutting guard, short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The orange cutting guard shield is too large and awkward. Because of it's design it is difficult to get close to the areas that need trimming. The battery did not last as long as expected. Really liked the adjustable features and it was lightweight. Before purchasing I did lots of research and this model was highly rated, and so I am disappointed. I returned the item and purchased a Black and Decker model instead. I really like the Black and Decker 20 Max LST522.
customer_reviews.author: nanabell

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money on something better.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not contain enough power. It kept getting jammed which was really frustrating that I did not even finish trimming my yard. On top of that, the battery died out quickly lasting only about 15 minutes when it is fully charged. I would not reccommend this product. Save your time and money on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for edging and trimming but not mowing
customer_reviews.text: This is a first time i have bought Worx and i am very pleased with the product. Works great for and edger and trimmer but i wouldnt say the same about mowing. I found it a bit difficult to handle for mowing but i didnt buy it for that purpose. Battery life is good for a small yard. I was able to do both my front and back yard on a single charge but my lawn size is not that big. Approx 30 mins is the right estimation for the battery life. I like how u can change the positions and the fact that the whole thing is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: MetalPenguin

customer_reviews.title: Works Good but has missing charge indicator
customer_reviews.text: The Trimmer/Edger was quick and easy to assemble and works well. It works much better that another brand of battery operated trimmer that I have been using. The battery works much longer. However, there is a manufacturing problem with the battery charger in that it comes with instructions on the functions of the charge indicator. There was no charge indicator on the original and the replacement trimmer that just arrived. I have a WORX blower and the charger has a charge indicator. I explained this in the return request to Amazon but rather than look into the charge indicator problem they just sent me another complete Trimmer/Edger with another charger that was missing the charge indicator lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Henderson

customer_reviews.title: No job to big for Worx Trimmer & Edger
customer_reviews.text: From a Condo in the City, to over an acre of wild country living, I found I needed a multi use trimmer mower and edger. I’m so thankful my first purchase and use is the Worx Cordless Edger & Trimmer. I had to wait for the rain to stop & weeds to dry before I could use this trimmer. By this time the weeds are over 3 feet. Doesn’t matter! This Worx Trimmer & Edger whacks them down in no time. I’m not young or strong, but the Worx is so lightweight even I can do this! Yippee.
customer_reviews.author: Becky F.

customer_reviews.title: It will do most grasses but not things like iron weeds or things that would grow to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I had already tried this out before I purchased mine so I already knew how well it would operate. The wheel allows me to do my own trimming otherwise health conditions would prevent that. You just push it along and guide it. It will do most grasses but not things like iron weeds or things that would grow to be woody. Easily put together. You can trim about 30 min each time but then I’ll ready to rest anyway. I charge it for 3 hours and it’s good to go again. Very lightweight and affordable
customer_reviews.author: cynthia metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and quiet
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to not to have a cord as I use this weed whacker. The battery is not that heavy, so it is easy to handle. The battery lasts about 20 minutes, so I ordered an extra battery to use. I appreciate how lightweight it is and the fact I don't have to work with gasoline. The spools that came with the implement must have been in a hot area; I had to pull out the spool and stretch it out for it to work satisfactorily. I had a bit of a hard time attaching the shield; was able to do it properly using a few clamps before I screwed it to the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Griskivich

customer_reviews.title: This really is a very nice piece of yard equipment and when you're older you ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is a very nice piece of yard equipment and when you're older you don't have to worry about chords are gasoline or anything you just take it pop the battery in and I'll use it most of all for a mini mower I live in a subdivision and so the yards aren't that big and I can just go out there and just mow the yard in between times until my other husband actually can get the lawnmower at least the yard stays all one level and it looks a lot nicer than overgrown very easy to use very nice
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a gas trimmer, but I sent it back bc it was so heavy and hard to handle. This thing is awesome. Its light, you can change the height to fit you better, and it converts into a edger/ mower so easily. Mine only came with 1 battery, which I was worried about at first, ( we have .25 acre to trim) but it hasn't been a problem. Its great, we love it
customer_reviews.author: SGB

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The batteries do not hold a charge for no more then 5 minutes each. So this weedwacker is pretty much useless . Borrowe my Dads black and decker that he bought at walmart for way over half the price of this one and it works so much better and was way more powerful and the battery held its charge to do the whe yard.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This edger/mower/weed whacker combo is great. I have a small yard (0.17 acres) and use it to cut any spots I missed mowing, edge my driveway and walkway, and weed whack around the flower beds. It's light weight, easy to use, and has good battery life. I'd definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Herman

customer_reviews.title: Battery live is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It says in the description that it will do an average 1/4 acre on one charge. Well I have used it for the last three days and I still have over half of my one acre yard to go, and this is after using other battery operated weed eaters when the Worx's battery gave out. There is no doubt that I have a lot of weeds, but that is why I bought a weed eater.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Had one for 5-6 years that worked great. So when it quit working , bought another. Spools don’t work correctly . Even after ordering new ones, they get stuck or are used up way too quickly. The cap on the spool keeps popping off which is so irritating.
customer_reviews.author: mic4414

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get any better!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this trimmer. I am so glad this was the trimmer I purchased. I have owned this trimmer for 4 mowing seasons and have never had a single issue. The string automatically extracts and works great. The guard provides good protection. The best part is the versatility on the trimmer. You can go from an edger to a trimmer in seconds and cuts through heavier grass with ease. The controls and adjustments are very simple and easy to use. I will definitely buy another one of these when this one dies, but there is no end in site for this hard working trimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: it's terrific, but I have to purchase another backup battery.
customer_reviews.text: lasts a long time and works so well. love the wheels and it's light weight. Update: Doesn't last as long as I thought. I will purchase another battery, and it takes so long to charge the battery. But I do love the product. Update: No need to buy another battery. It does last long enough for my jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love my weed eater! I used to have to rely on our sons or my husband to do the heavy work of trimming but, with the WORX, I can do the finish work in our yard all by myself. I feel very self sufficient! It is easy to use, easy to charge the battery and easy to change the string! Our yard is fairly large so it does take two batteries to do but I bought two and change out half way through. This is the first summer I have had this item, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a mower
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted the mower functionality b/c part of my yard is on a steep slope. However, its performance was horrible. The wheel height is not adjustable so the mowed grass is way too long. I ended up holding it by hand to cut the grass on the slope (like a normal trimmer). The trimmer and edger functions fine but I don't see the need to pay a premium just for that.
customer_reviews.author: LordBlacksilver

customer_reviews.title: This is "NOT" the best Trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I have worked with other trimmers/Edgers before and this is the worst piece of equipment - I have ever used!!!!! It does not groove a line in the grass/dirt or anything else - this is a "TOY"!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindergarten Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Only works for about 30 minutes and takes 4 hours for the battery to charge. I have a front and back yard so if i plan to weed eat i have to split it into 3 different days for it all to get done. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best electric one I've used yet!
customer_reviews.text: Me and this trimmer have become best buddies this spring. My dad's yard was in much need of TLC. He lives in a normal suburb neighborhood and the battery lets me do his entire front and back yard with out running out. I don't know how long it can go, since it hasn't quit yet!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Price- Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Never use a two-stroke or corded trimmer/edger again! I had a corded bladed edger (which replaced the smelly gas version) that worked great for two years, then the blades went dull. Plus, I was always tethered by the cord. The WORX GT 2.0 took a mere fraction of the time, and once I got the hang of placement, the edge was perfect! I'm 5'5" and this was a bit short for me.. the only negative aspect! Also, I have no idea how long the string will last, so I will buy a few extra to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: P.B. of Albany, NY

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy that i purchased this weed eater... I went from a gas/oil mix weed eater that was extremely difficult to start, very noisy, and would cut out halfway through the job, to this first trigger pull, powerful battery, weed eater.. I can finish my yard with this Worx wacker before I could get my expensive, crappy gas/oil wacker started... I will never go back to the gas/oil again.. Never have to worry about gas going bad over the winter, carbs clogging, gas line rotting... buy this for $99 & you will be glad you did...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Micciche

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weed wacker... Not really powerful but okay
customer_reviews.text: I like this weed wacker but don't LOVE it because of the lack of power. It works fine, but won't go through thicker weeds. I love the fact that I don't have to try and get my gas weed wacker started anymore... I do love the battery power as opposed to gasoline. Which also makes this extremely light and ergonomic to use for this 61 year old woman.
customer_reviews.author: pac

customer_reviews.title: Low trimming power with a superb design.
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism of the trimmer is A-class. Superb design and changes into an edger or a mower in seconds. The reason I gave it it a two is because of the power. The cutting capacity is very low - like a toy. A single string with probably ,065 size is no match for double string gas trimmer that I use. I have decided to keep my old Bolen mode.
customer_reviews.author: Debabrata Bhattacharjee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine Terrible String
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer itself is excellent. Is only a few weeks old but the battery easily let's me edge 500 ft of lawn 2 times before recharge. The trimmer line is garbage. It is constantly breaking from what looks like manufacturing defects or is just really poor material. I'm getting some after market to replace the WORX stuff. Other than the string the trimmer is great. I don't think the string is a big issue - it is probably cheaper just to buy string at Home Depot rather than pay the shipping charge for the WORX string.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer with a Great Battery!
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasts great for my purposes. It takes me about 10 or 15 minutes to trim the borders of our front and back yards, and this trimmer can usually go 3 or 4 rounds before needing recharged. It's lightweight and can chop through some pretty thick vegetation. I especially love the auto-feed string! I used this trimmer for the entirety of last summer and it has not run out of string or jammed up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Descent for $100
customer_reviews.text: Works great, considering the battery does take hours to charge. The battery lasts about 100 feet of 1 foot tall weeds/grass. So I would image your average height grass it would last 300 lineal feet easy. I suggest the extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: I had the previous model years ago which I liked but i beat it to death
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model years ago which I liked but i beat it to death, but this new version with the redesigned battery pack has amazing power. I will put this one through its paces but so far I'm super impressed. The edging feature is my new best friend - a well-precisioned time saver! I own other Worx products as well - they just keep pumping out good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: P Daddy

customer_reviews.title: commercials made this looks like this was the best
customer_reviews.text: commercials made this looks like this was the best.. its sounds great. but the main part of this tool is worthless. crap.. one little piece of grass at a time. took forever to edge. horrible and that plastic rope that suppose to edge all of a sudden it looks like it melted stuck together that I can not pull apart. this was a waste of my money. this piece of junk is just going to take up space in my garage. I am looking to buy now a edger that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Worx Weedeater
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. Bought my first one from the store. To bad they only sell them as a comb with blower at twice the price in store so I was happy to find this on Amazon. Battery last about 40min. light duty. Battery life is contingent to grass thickness and height which is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: I’ll give it a 8 out of 10, the good features out rule to bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give it a 8 out of 10, the good features out rule to bad. The only two things I did not like was only one cutting string but it did fine and it has a manual string release opposed to automatic. Very light easy to use and the adjustable head for trimming is a big plus. One Battery completed my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hunter

customer_reviews.title: More work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work good. Makes trimming Alot harder then it has to be. String breaks all the time and does not refeed itself. It does last for a few too many years but not good
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: ... used it three times and apparently the battery is bad now. I charge it
customer_reviews.text: I've used it three times and apparently the battery is bad now. I charge it, the tool works for a few seconds then quits. I should have gone with the Dewalt but didn't want to spend the money. Now I will spend it on replacing batteries instead. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad elbow and lifting and holding things up is very ...
customer_reviews.text: I live on 15 acres and I mow just about a acre, I have a bad elbow and lifting and holding things up is very hard for me to do. SO I thought I would give the worx's a try and I LOVE IT. So easy for me use. I have a lot of trees, land scape bricks, and the battery will do it all. Thanks Worx's for making it easy for me to weed wack.
customer_reviews.author: CKB56

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly tough
customer_reviews.text: This is one tough little weedeater!! I have a huge place and there's lots of small trees with some of those really thick weeds and this weed eater goes through them like nothing. You definitely need a spare battery if you have a large yard but this little dude can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the smaller yard and not for large grass mostly for well kept yards. It will put a perfect line on your side walk love the ease of use for this I have a few Worx products and love that the batteries are interchangeable extremely helpful. I would recommend this every time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good for light worn
customer_reviews.text: Some what difficult to attach guard to device. Light weight and functional if you do not have a lot to do. Serves my purpose I guess with no worry about gasoline or electric cords. It was difficult to keep on. I am more patient than most. Make sure you have it fully charged before using. Ran for almost an hour on full charge then wouldn't work. Took me a few minutes to realize it needed recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Zitschy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Versitile Weed Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Actually, my wife wanted this. Go figure? Finds my gas one to be to heavy and intimidating. She 'wants' to be able to do this. Again, go figure? Actually a fairly powerful little weed trimmer. Does the job and very well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: CNC

customer_reviews.title: Is that new or old?
customer_reviews.text: When I open the box why it the item not clean , it so dirty, look like it old or some one used it
customer_reviews.author: Hongson

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is short.
customer_reviews.text: Besides spool line problem (it breaks easily and often) the battery life is short, I couldn't finish edging my front yard along the street side, which took about 15 minutes or less. I have a 20-volt Worx blower so I was able to use that battery to finish the work. The battery charging time is too long, it takes hours. Don't expect to use it on a big yard or for a long period of time, continuous 15 minutes use at top.
customer_reviews.author: SRSSTVS

customer_reviews.title: great idea if you don't keep breaking the string
customer_reviews.text: this is very misleading, this product does not come with a blade, it is supposed to edge trim with the string, great idea if you don't keep breaking the string. very disappointed would not purchase this again or recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: rmc

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this April 29th and have only used it 4 times— 3 times just to trim grass, and once to trim weeds behind my garage. Despite having a fully charged battery and the string being installed correctly, it just stopped trimming anything. It spins, but obviously not aggressively enough to trim and edge. And now it’s past the return window. This is a waste of money. Buy ryobi if you want a quality battery operated yard tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For 1/4 acre yard and Under Playsets
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to replace a gas trimmer for my 1/4 acre city lot. The gas trimmer was loud and too much of a beast for what I needed in a trimmer. The Worx 2.0 is exactly what I was looking for....quiet, battery-operated with the capability of edging and trimming. The best part for me is the added benefit of it being a mini mower, which is perfect for mowing the grass under and around our playset and shed. After a month of use, I have nothing bad to say about this trimmer....it's perfect for my size lawn and for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Makes a fantastic edge line!
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer/edger is fantastic. Most impressive to me is that it makes a great edge line. It is light weight and easy to adjust to the various positions. I like the safety button on the trigger. I like the edging and trimming wheels. They help me keep a straight line and uniform height. The only negative is as others have said the battery truly didn’t last that long. I will order an extra battery to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This product is so functional. I love all of the WORX products I've purchased over the years,and the same batteries work on all of them. WORX makes high quality tools and at great values.
customer_reviews.author: Novice gardener

customer_reviews.title: It literally does nothing
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video 😂 I bought this product in May, and I just now got to use it. I honestly don’t know if this is a joke or not. I live on a farm, but even around the house this item could not cut the grass. I could hand pick the edges of the sidewalk faster. Or buy a goat, I don’t know 🤷‍♀️. I think I got pranked...
customer_reviews.author: jeff simon

customer_reviews.title: Freedom in moving from area to area
customer_reviews.text: Have the blower and enjoy the freedom of the battery pack. This works great, trimming, small grass spots and edging. Battery life is not as long as I'd like but with the extra battery; I was able to complete both my back and front yard. Of course I have a smaller lot; not an acre.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa90540i

customer_reviews.title: Charger default?
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed but now about 6 months later the charger won’t charge the battery anymore. Tried to find a replacement charger but can only find a dual one and it’s over $50.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size was important to me. quick to operate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for me, and very easy to operate. It is battery operated but the battery stays charge enough for me to complete my job. It is very light weight I could not follow the instruction to change the spool and I went on youtube, saw the video made by the Manufacturer and it was a snap. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Good product but has difficulty getting into tight corners. The design should be modified so it can fit snuggly in corners. The battery runs out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JJPM2

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i couldn't give 5 stars is because the wheels fall off quite often while I'm mowing. Product is great, concept is great, battery life is great, it's lightweight.. Just annoying to keep putting the wheels back on.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I got it due to my arthritic hands making starting up my gas one, nearly impossible. And, my old gas one was not good for edging. I bought an extra battery so if one crapped out before I was done, I could finish the job. I am so glad I stopped to watch the infomercial on this. My yard looks so much better since I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Soaplady123

customer_reviews.title: but I was still a little disappointed. Pros
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the positive reviews. I wasn't expecting the "Terminator" of weed whackers, but I was still a little disappointed. Pros: very lightweight, easy to assemble, easy to operate, the thread works well & doesn't wear down, and changing the spools out is super-easy. Women should love this. Cons: if you're planning on taking out grass larger than a few microns, "you're going to need a bigger boat." I would purchase this item again, and it's a great compliment to your toolbox, just be realistic. You can't play Paul Bunion with this pea-shooter.
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Monkey

customer_reviews.title: It's the BEST weed wacker out there
customer_reviews.text: Also was a gift for Christmas. I have one so I bought my son one. It's the BEST weed wacker out there. So easy to use to change out the plastic spool,which become very frustrating on other models. I love mine! Easy to maneuver and pretty light weight.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Made well other than the grass shield!
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the grass shield. Other than than that so easy to make adjustment!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerGwen Monson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The string is self feed but only stays about 6 inches not 12 as stated. Have let it run without cutting never gets longer than 6. It’s not very powerful, doesn’t cut great and will not edge even the smallest of grass. It is lightweight but I would not purchase again. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: jamie mendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with my Worx. I'm still learning how to use it but having fun with it. It's so much easier for a senior citizen who is also disabled.
customer_reviews.author: carrie j mclean

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I hate weed eating but this tool sure makes it much easier. I love all the positions, like edging, etc. The wheel makes edging easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mini-Mower for Small Yards
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our lawn. It's extremely easy to use and light enough that I can use it myself at 9 months pregnant. Our back "yard" is literally the size of two picnic tables, so the mini-mower feature is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Amanda Piglowski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! Love it! So easy to handle, lightweight, and the battery lasts long enough for my entire yard. A second battery was very pricey, so for another $45 I was able to purchase another trimmer! So now I have two batteries and two trimmers. I also have the blower which is another awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to the advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Battery life was only 30 minutes, took too long to charge. String does not work correctly, advances all the trimmer line upon use, the only way I can use it is to hook the line inside the spool, so it want advance, in other words manually. I would never purchase another works product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TRIMMER!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product!!! The string feeds automatically so you don't have to keep hitting it against the ground/sidewalk. It's perfect for the trimming needs of the average homeowner!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a wheel for wedding also because I'm disabled, works great
customer_reviews.author: Angel M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable to use but short stock battery
customer_reviews.text: Nice to quickly switch for different terrain and edging. Compact to fold up and store in corner. Battery dies quicker than I can do everything I need to on small 1/3 acre. Handle adjustments easy and comfortable so I will be searching if there is a heavier, extended battery for longer cut times. All-in-all, cordless electric completely worth it to easily grab and go!
customer_reviews.author: swangersVA

customer_reviews.title: Read the ad carefully this is 20 volt. 40-volt
customer_reviews.text: I had a 40-volt I work we look exactly like this one when I bought it I thought it was 40 volt didn't read all the way check it out it's pretty weak might be used for a garden or something really light
customer_reviews.author: Light6060

customer_reviews.title: A nice tool!
customer_reviews.text: Now this tool I really do like! Light, easy to use, easy to switch uses. Have a lot of edging and weeding to do, but managed it all on one charge. I'm an old man, and my shoulders can't handle the heavier gas model edger/weeder anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Old Fella

customer_reviews.title: I like the versatility and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second. I have 3 batteries and an upgraded charger(I think this is mandatory, I think the basic one can ruin batteries). I like the versatility and ease of use. I do think that the original was better, the new one doesn't feel the same, ergonomics off a bit. Still the best for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: mikman

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good weed eater that doesn’t use gasoline!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a neat little weed eater with 3 different settings. Battery power holds well. My complaint- it’s a pain in the tail to roll and edge with. Not as easy as the pictures make it look.
customer_reviews.author: *NightOwlLady*

customer_reviews.title: ... gone through numerous weed eaters - this one is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through numerous weed eaters - this one is easy to use. The battery lasts through the yard work (front and back). Easy spool replacement. I've not had trouble with the line over feeding or no feed like the others. This is not the tool to chop down the lower 40, but good for the average yard.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 20 minutes and the battery died. I had to recharge the battery in the middle of completing my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: is you have a big yard is to weak for the job and it need more work from the manufacturer to make a good tool
customer_reviews.author: Melvin D velez

customer_reviews.title: Look closely when purchasing "2 batteries, no".
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very flimsy made, so don't know how long it will last. Still upset they show 2 batteries and you only get 1.
customer_reviews.author: Egor

customer_reviews.title: It is great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had a tragedy in my life, and needed to learn how to do yard work on my own. This little device has helped me greatly! And, to top it off, it's almost fun!!!!! I would recommend this to anyone that asked!
customer_reviews.author: M. Gerardi

customer_reviews.title: Quiet/Funtional
customer_reviews.text: I've had the predecessor to this model for over ten years, and decided to order the new model "just in case." The new model is better, in that it has a longer extension and the ease of adjusting the angles of the cutting end is ridiculously easy.
customer_reviews.author: TCI

customer_reviews.title: By the cheaper on in this case
customer_reviews.text: Weak and cheaply made. Can buy the black and decker cheaper and about the same
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get together still have not been able to get to work
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Dennis

customer_reviews.title: WORX GT
customer_reviews.text: I like my WORX GT ....easy to use. The battery lasts about 20 minutes and for me that is fine. I just work about that long before I give out. I would not work longer with a gas trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... hours to charge and only last 20min - very disappointed after all the exciment I had when purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Battery takes hours and hours to charge and only last 20min - very disappointed after all the exciment I had when purchasing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is not strong enough to do any real work with it
customer_reviews.author: mrs. mop

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Bit on the weak side and could use 2 sided string vs the one. Nice light weight so easy to handle. Just take a few more passes to actually cut stuff compared to my gas one. I blame the 1 string on that.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my hubby, and he loves it. Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of trim work needing to be done, and our old trimmer quit after years of use. I had seen this on TV, and he had mentioned he liked it. The day it arrived, he charged it, and started it up. The yard hasnt needed a trim since! Love this product! Great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jerene Reney

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts to any length. Easy to replace spools. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bought one at a garage sale three years ago and just had to buy a new one. I am disabled and find this easy to use. The spool cutting thread is easy to replace. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Smith

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use for small areas.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, so easy to grab and go, light weight and so efficient to use
customer_reviews.author: sondra r jack

customer_reviews.title: love edging with this unit
customer_reviews.text: love edging with this unit. so lightweight and does good job. my only negative comment is that the line does not always advance very well and sometimes when trimming, I have to stop and advance the line manually. Otherwise I love this unit and all the nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda A Gelsuo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this trimmer!! I 've had several different brands over the years and this is the very best. I'm a almost 70 and the trimmer is light weight and love that's battery run. Worx is the one that work!
customer_reviews.author: Cristie P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent edger, so so with the trimming
customer_reviews.text: Excellent edger, so so with the trimming. However poor designs with the wheel staying on. Need better wheel placement. Where it locks on the devise.
customer_reviews.author: gregory  mcneil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Had a perfectly good gas trimmer, but for me it was useless. There was no way I could get it pull-started and, if I had, it was way too long and heavy for me to use. I am 5'2" tall and this trimmer is so adjustable I can create a perfect fit. The battery is more than adequate for a complete clean-up trim after mowing. One of the best investments I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: MPjohn

customer_reviews.title: its super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: its super easy to use, being cordless electric however it doesn't last very long I do have a second battery. The nice thing is my 10 yr old can use it without any problems, so its just a give and take on what you really want
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy working in the yard
customer_reviews.text: The only way to trim....I enjoy working in the yard.... but you look outdated using a trimmer with a power cord. This trimmer has just as much or more power than my electric trimmer. Great product.....Buy it now!!!
customer_reviews.author: J R RIDD

customer_reviews.title: For small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces! I can’t lift a heavy weed eater so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rita L. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: cheaply made wont handle the big weed I need to cut
customer_reviews.author: Cuda70

customer_reviews.title: How can I return it.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I need. I doesn't handle the weeds here I live in the country
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, all way around.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light weight. Only useful for light trimming. Instructions could be easier to follow. Still on first charge after using twice.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Calder

customer_reviews.title: started working with it and it worked great but only for 29 minutes before it stopped
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited with this product, started working with it and it worked great but only for 29 minutes before it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Richard Quevreaux

customer_reviews.title: Awesome yard tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little weed eater! Only drawback is the battery life is not very long, and the batteries are not interchangeable with other WORX products (I have the blower that uses a 35W battery). Would suggest obtaining a second battery if using for more then 20 minutes or more.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my small yard! I let my trim work go all summer long and really wanted to tidy it up and this did the job flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

product_meta.title: WORX WG160 GT 2.0 20V PowerShare Cordless String Trimmer/Edger/Mini Mower
product_meta.description: The WORX cordless 20-volt MAX lithium powered grass trimmer has taken grass trimming and edging to a whole new level of power and function. With the 20-volts of MAX lithium battery power, the WG160 provides longer run times and more power. The 12-inch cutting diameter means more trimming in less time. Not only will this cordless trimmer convert to an edger in seconds, but it is also a mini mower. It has dual-positioned in-line wheels that make edging a breeze. The wheels can also be used as a "mowing-like" function for detailed trimming around landscape or hard to reach areas. A quick-release trigger lever is convenient for making easy height adjustments to the telescopic shaft for comfort and control. The trimmer head turns with a pull and turn to lock and convert to edging. The MAX lithium battery power means more battery capacity, longer runtimes, no self-discharge, no slow loss of power, less weight, more power and quicker charging times.Charge the battery within 3-hours and it will be ready when you need it with no-self discharge. From function to features, the 20-volt WORX trimmer and edger features 100% single line feed which means no bumping to extend the line. A flower space guard not only helps protect vegetation, it also acts as an edger guide. A front auxiliary handle has 7 locking adjustments for maximum comfort while trimming, edging, or mowing. Weighing in at only 6-pounds, this 20-volt grass trimmer, edger and mini mower will create a professional looking yard with less work, less fatigue and less time.
feature_bullets: 3 in 1 function with dual position wheels for grass trimming, edging and mowing
Converts from a trimmer to an in line edger in seconds with no tools
One (1) 20 Volt cordless MAX lithium battery
12 inch cutting diameter with automatic 100 percent single line feed (no bump)
Quick release lever for fast telescopic height adjustments to the 90 degree tilting shaft
Dual function flower spacer guard helps protect vegetation and acts as an edger guide
Ultra lightweight, ergonomic design : only 5.7 pounds
Share batteries across all your 20V Power Share WORX tools so you never run out of power

No Load Speed : 7600/minute; Cutting Line Length : 10 inches It takes 3 hours to fully charge the battery with the included charger; Each 20V Max Lithium Battery will provide enough working time per charge to trim around the average 1/4 acre yard; Actual results may vary depending on the density of the grass or weeds you’re cutting or the age of the battery pack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars953 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
